snippet: The magazine accused the Times Company of inducing breach of contract when it hired its editor in chief, Jake Silverstein.
abstract: Publisher of Texas Monthly files lawsuit against The New York Times Company related to Times's hiring of magazine's departing editor in chief, Jake Silverstein; magazine accuses Times Company of inducing breach of contract.
lead_paragraph: The magazine accused the Times Company of inducing breach of contract when it hired its editor in chief, Jake Silverstein.

headline.main: Texas Monthly Sues Times Co. Over New Hire
headline.print_headline: Texas Monthly Sues Times Co. Over New Hire
